name: Nook416
headline: Multiplatform Group Expense Management Made Simple
description: Nook416 is a multiplatform app designed to simplify shared finances among friends, roommates, and travel groups. It helps users track who paid for what, split expenses by shares, and maintain a clear overview of balances to make settling up easy and transparent. The app also includes a shared shopping list to keep everyone aligned on what still needs to be purchased. Built with Flutter and Firebase, Nook416 uses a single codebase to deliver a consistent experience across iOS and Android. This project involved the full product cycle, from problem discovery and UX design to development, testing, and store publication.

name: Dopamine News
headline: Daily News Reading Experience Reimagined
description: Dopamine is a daily news reading app designed to bring the experience of a physical newspaper into a digital format. It combines curated news, puzzles, and daily horoscopes to offer a calm and intentional way to stay informed. Built with SwiftUI and SceneKit for 3D animations that enhance depth and reinforce its editorial identity. A main technical challenge was implementing a custom word search interaction, mapping finger gestures to grid positions for a natural and intuitive user experience.

name: Profitto
headline: Financial Management for Small Businesses
description: A comprehensive financial management solution for small business owners: streamline sales tracking, inventory control, pricing strategies, and performance insights — all in one intuitive platform designed to solve the complexity of managing multiple spreadsheets and disconnected tools.

name: Memorelo
headline: Record and Celebrate Family Memories
description: A mobile application designed to help families record and celebrate memories, track developmental milestones, and strengthen their bonds. It provides a secure, shared space for families to document their journey together with a timeline, gallery, and activity suggestions.

name: Freela onTap
headline: Connecting Freelancers with Hospitality Companies
description: A platform connecting freelancers and hospitality companies, solving the chaos and disorganization in job posting and prospecting within this sector. Features job search and filtering, company registration, job management dashboard, and direct contact via WhatsApp.
